Unable to Process Stop Payment (Close Proximity to DD)
PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL
Good morning/afternoon,
Thank you for your e-mail.
Please be advised that due to its close proximity, we are unable to stop the (MM/DD/YYYY) payment.
All subsequent payments however, have been stopped.
To avoid an overpayment from occurring, the customer will be required to request a one-time stop payment at their bank.
In the case that a stop payment cannot be made, thereby resulting in an overpayment, a full reimbursement will be issued to the customer pending clearance of the payout/overpayment (approximately 2 weeks).
Should the customer wish to expedite the refund procedure, a bank statement showing the successful debit of the payout/overpayment can be provided to us via e-mail or fax. Once received and reviewed, a rush request will be processed to have the reimbursement issued to the customer within 72 business hours via an Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT).
E-mail: hcfi_natl_cs@ch.honda.com
Fax: 1-866-920-5586
Should you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reply to this email or contact us at 1-800-387-5399. Our hours of operation are Monday to Friday, 8:00am to 8:00pm EST.
Regards,
Customer Service Honda Financial Services Tel.: 1-800-387-5399 Please visit our owners website at www.myhonda.ca to register and have access to your account online through the My Finance section. __________________________
This transmission (including attachments, if any) is confidential and may be privileged. It is intended only for the person(s) named above.
